description: Scenario forced experiment with prescribed land surface climatology derived from "present climate" conditions (1980-2014) and prescribed SST (sea surface temperatures).
keywords: LS3MIP, Tier 2, Historical Scenario, Prescribed land, prescribed SST
long_name: prescribed land surface climatology and SST derived from present climate
rationale: Diagnose land-climate feedback over land. To diagnose the role of land-atmosphere feedback at climate time scales.

requirements.description: Historical scenario, from 1980 to the end of the 21st century
requirements.label: 1980-2100 121yrs

requirements.description: Land surface forcing climatology for present climate (1980-2014).  Note the climatological median of soil water and snow water is to be used instead of climatological means.
requirements.keywords: LFMIP, present climate, land surface forcing
requirements.label: LFMIP-CAForcing

requirements.description: An ensemble of at least one simulation
requirements.keywords: minimum 1, at least 1, ensemble, run, simulation
requirements.label: MinimumOne

requirements.description: An Atmosphere only general circulation model configuration.
requirements.label: AGCM Configuration
